channel.title: EarthscapE - Version 1 To 2.5 - Over 1000 Downloads Combined -
channel.description:
[u][b]What Is Earthscape?[/b][/u] Earthscape is a project i started a while ago, while i had just begun coding runescape private servers. It is a balanced source, with great pking, and also a manageable economy. I was aiming for something that looked earth-like, hence the home in Version one, the training in version 1 and 2, and the pk area, which has been maintained through all 3 versions released so far. It has a unique way of runecrafting, which i have totally integrated into the source, it seems as tho it was a part of the runescape we now emulate.
[u][b]What Is So Great About Earthscape?[/b][/u] Earthscape isn't one of those server like deltascape, which will become immensely famous, as i only use it to test certain codes.
Earthscape has the following Features -
Version 1 -
Never Before Seen Home The portals used, had never been used before. Summoning A Never Before Seen Pking Area Never Before Seen Shops New Wyvern Area New dagganoth Area Wishing Well Custom Items (viewable only with silabgarza client)
Version 2 -
Version 2 was more 1.5, as i only coded a new home, and added more commands,etc New home Fixed some glitches Added a News System New Vengeance
Version 2.5 New runecrafting New Vengeance 'players online' scoreboard
[u][b]Downloads [/b][/u] If you dont want to see pictures, etc just download here - [url=http://uppit.com/VDDG8M]Version 1[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/XXFAWK]Version 2[/url] [url=http://sgclient.tk] SilabGarza Client ( To view Custom Items )[/url]
[u][b]Version One[/b][/u]
This is version 1 of earthscape
Normal Commands - [code]armorhelp pest rep pc gopc tz home client agility train wyvern dag defender jad wc pk dragons kqueen fish 3rdage farm slayer smith mypk gsmini starter [/code]
Staff Commands - [code] testskull gamecount eat alert lupdate pnpc giveadmin givemod giveowner Demote testminigame noclip xrichie xteleall pickup xteletome xteleto god godoff modzone membership suggest master clicks ipban banuser unban macrowarn getpass setlvls [/code]
HOME
[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/home-1.jpg[/img]
PORTALS
[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/portals.jpg[/img]
DaganoTH
[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/dags.jpg[/img]
RunecraftinG
[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/runecrafting.jpg[/img]
ShopS
[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/shops-1.jpg[/img]
TheivE [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/theive-3.jpg[/img]
- DownloaD - http://uppit.com/VDDG8M
[u][b]Version 2[/b][/u] More like v 1.5
Normal Commands - [code]armorhelp pest rep pc gopc tz home client agility train wyvern dag defender jad wc pk dragons kqueen fish 3rdage farm slayer smith mypk gsmini starter [/code]
Staff Commands - [code] testskull gamecount eat alert lupdate pnpc giveadmin givemod giveowner Demote testminigame noclip xrichie xteleall pickup xteletome xteleto god godoff modzone membership suggest master clicks ipban banuser unban macrowarn getpass setlvls [/code]
HOME
[IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/untitled-4.jpg[/img]
- DownloaD - http://uppit.com/XXFAWK [u][b]
Version 2.5[/b][/u] I have added a new runecrafting.
Not really much... [u][b]
Version 3[/b][/u]
Version 3 will be released soon What to expect - Version 3 will be the end of Earthscape, as i will continue with Flamescape.
[b][u]I AM RAZOR FROM RUNESTYLE.COM THE BEST RSPS SITE[/u][/b] [/center]

What Is Earthscape?
